entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Occasional drifting snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13.
